Overview  Package  Class  Use  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV   NEXT FRAMES    NO FRAMES    
Packages
br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles The core classes of the application, such as the desktop starter, the controller and the player profile.
br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.data The data access layer, responsible for the communication with external means of storage.
br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.games Classes representing each battle of the game.
br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.model The game's logic layer, responsible for the core functionalities without concern for the data itself.
br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.model.enemies A package with the enemy logic of each match.
br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.object2d This package contains the visual components of the game, including cards, energy/life bars and the map, for example.
br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.screens The visual layer (interfaces).
br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.screens.utils Auxiliary classes for the interfaces.
br.edu.ifsp.lp2.shadowstruggles.scripts The scripts are classes which specify the behavior of cards in battles.
